business.headline: Income tax relief in Budget 2025? Economists push for cuts to help save moreEconomists argued that reducing the tax burden would increase disposable income, enabling citizens to save more and spend on essentials. This, in turn, could help revive demand in sectors impacted by weak consumption.

Insurance penetration in India dipped, but premium collection grewInsurance penetration in India, which is already low, saw a dip for the second successive year, shows the latest report by the insurance industry regulator. This is contrary to the global trend. The Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority (IRDAI) report shows growth in premium collection in 2023-24. Insurance companies rejected 11% of all claims in FY24.
Mamata Machinery IPO share price: Strong listing ahead? Check latest GMPMamata Machinery IPO saw massive interest from investors over its 3-day bidding process and was subscribed close to 200 times.

DAM Capital Advisors IPO listing: Is strong market debut on cards? Check GMPDAM Capital Advisors IPO received an overwhelming response, being subscribed 81.88 times overall by the close of Day 3 on December 23, 2024.

GST on popcorn: Know how much tax your movie-time snack will attractDuring its 55th meeting, the GST Council clarified the tax treatment for popcorn after a request from Uttar Pradesh to specify the GST rate for popcorn seasoned with salt and spices.

Understanding GST on used cars: Rules, examples, and exemptionsThe GST Council clarified rules for old vehicle sales, setting an 18 per cent tax on seller margins, exempting private sales and negative margins, and simplifying taxation for used and electric vehicles, ensuring fair application of GST across transactions.

Economy rebounds in Q3 with boost from festivals and rural demand: RBIAn article on the 'State of the Economy' in the December bulletin noted that the global economy continues to exhibit resilience with steady growth and moderating inflation.
Sensex, Nifty close lower in a choppy session; IT and metal stocks weighThe S&P BSE Sensex was down by 67.30 points to close at 78,472.87, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 23.35 points to end at 23,730.10.

18% GST on used cars: Do you have to pay tax on selling your car?The decision has sparked debates as it comes at a time when India's used car market is poised for growth. Many believe the move aims to tap into the rapidly expanding sector to boost government revenue.
Tata Capital IPO buzz? All you need to knowIf the IPO goes through, it will be the Tata Group's second public offering in two decades. The last one was Tata Technologies' IPO in November last year.

Who is Aakash Chaudhry? Zerodha, Zomato founders bet on Sparkl EdventureInvestors include Zomato founder Deepinder Goyal and Zerodha founder Nithin Kamath, who have backed the platform that aims to transform personalised learning for students.

Sanathan Textiles IPO allotment: Check step-by-step guide to check statusSanathan Textiles IPO: Investors can verify their allotment status through two platforms: the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) website and the KFin Technologies portal. Here's a step-by-step guide:

Apple nears $4 trillion valuation amid AI push and iPhone upgrade hopesApple's strategic push into AI and its resilience in navigating market challenges have positioned the tech giant as a leader in the sector.
Greaves Cotton share price gains over 10% today. What's behind the rally? Greaves Cotton stock price: The company's shares were trading 10.25% higher at Rs 252.70 on the BSE at 12:18 pm.

Explained: Why Tata Investment share price jumped 12% todayTata Investment stock price: At 11:53 am, shares of the company were up 11.51% to Rs 7,284 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). The surge followed reports that Tata Capital is gearing up for an initial public offering (IPO) worth Rs 15,000 crore.

Are stock markets closed on December 25? Check the full 2025 holiday scheduleOn regular weekdays, the stock market operates from 9:15 AM to 3:30 PM. A pre-opening session takes place from 9:00 AM to 9:15 AM to set the tone for the trading day.

Which insurance companies reject claims the least? Report reveals truthPeople don't just put in money but trust when they buy insurance policies to cover for medical emergencies or motor accidents. A report by the Insurance Brokers Association of India reveals how many such claims have been accepted or rejected by insurance companies in 2022-23.

Carraro India IPO: Check GMP, price band and subscription statusCarraro India IPO is a Rs 1,250 crore offer for sale (OFS) consisting of 1.77 crore shares. As this is a pure OFS, the entire proceeds will go to the selling shareholders, and the company will not raise fresh capital.

Senores Pharmaceuticals IPO: Latest subscription status, GMP; listing dateSenores Pharmaceuticals IPO: The IPO comprises a fresh issue of shares worth Rs 500 crore and an offer-for-sale (OFS) of up to 21,00,000 equity shares by promoters and existing shareholders.

Sagility India share price rises 5% to hit upper circuit today. Here's why Sagility India debuted on the stock market with an issue price of Rs 30 per share. At its current level, the stock has surged over 63% from the IPO price, underscoring strong investor interest.

entertainment.headline: House of cards actor Kevin Spacey given bail, what happens to #metoo now?From American Beauty to House of Cards, one of the most lauded actors of his generation, Kevin Spacey has a tainted reputation. In a new turn, the Oscar-winning actor "strenuously" denied allegations of sexual assault against him and got bail. Watch to know more

Images of Nayantara wearing sandals inside Tirupati temple sparks outrage against newlywed coupleAfter the grand wedding between Nayantara and Vignesh, the couple went to the Tirupati temple to offer prayers.

However, images of Nayantara wearing footwear inside the temple area has sparked outrage among the devotees against the couple.

While Vignesh was spotted walking barefoot, Nayantara was seen wearing sandals, which caused a massive uproar amongst devotees in the area.

Temple authorities issued a clarification saying it was permitted for devotees to wear footwear in that area.

Cannes Film Festival 2022: Deepika, Aishwarya walk the red carpet; Indian pavilion inauguratedThe 75th annual Cannes Film Festival began on May 17. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Deepika Padukone walked the red carpet on Day 3 of the 10-day film festival. 

On the second day, May 18, Union Minister for I&B, Youth Affairs & Sports, Anurag Thakur, inaugurated the India Pavilion at the Cannes Film Festival. The special event was also attended by several Indian celebrities, including Deepika Padukone, R. Madhavan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tamannaah Bhatia and others.

Deepika Padukone, who is part of the Cannes 2022 jury, talked about Indian films at the event and said that she believes there will be a day when Cannes will be in India.
Disco king Bappi Lahiri passes away at 69 Singer-composer Bappi Lahiri passed away on Wednesday, February 16, at a Mumbai hospital. He was 69.

Andheri court summons Shilpa Shetty, Shamita, their mother Sunanda The Andheri court has issued summons to Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty, her sister Shamita and their mother Sunanda over non-repayment of loan.

general news.headline: Russia-bound plane crashes in Kazakhstan, 42 feared deadAzerbaijan Airlines plane crash: An Azerbaijan Airlines flight carrying over 65 people crashed near Kazakhstan's Aktau and 42 people were feared killed.

ED, CBI got orders from BJP to arrest Atishi in fake case: Arvind KejriwalIn a veiled dig at the BJP, Arvind Kejriwal said 'some people' were rattled by the Delhi government's announcement of welfare initiatives like the Mahila Samman Yojana and the Sanjeevani Yojana.

3 killed, over 24 injured as bus falls into gorge near Uttarakhand's BhimtalA bus headed to Haldwani from Almora lost control and fell into a gorge near Uttarakhand's Bhimtal town. Rescue operations are underway.

ED probing Canadian colleges over trafficking of Indians into US: ReportThe investigation stems from the tragic death of a four-member family from Dingucha village in Gujarat, who succumbed to extreme cold while attempting to cross the border illegally on January 19, 2022.

Why Pakistani missiles have jolted US out of slumber now. No, India's not a factorThe US has slapped sanctions on Pakistan, its longstanding ally in the supposed war on terror, over long-range ballistic missiles. Pakistan's missiles have had India within their range, but they can't reach the US, 12,000 kilometres away. So, what threat has jolted the US out of its slumber?

This is contrary to the global trend. The Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority (IRDAI) report shows growth in premium collection in 2023-24. Insurance companies rejected 11% of all claims in FY24.

Student sexually assaulted in Chennai university, Annamalai slams law and orderThe incident, which took place on December 23 evening, came to light after the Anna University student lodged a police complaint on Tuesday.

Raha Kapoor makes Christmas cuter: Alia and Ranbir can't stop smilingAlia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor celebrated Christmas with their two-year-old daughter Raha at Kunal Kapoor's house. Adorably dressed in a white frock, Raha stole the limelight.

Video: Moment plane nosedived, turned into ball of fire after crash in KazakhstanA plane carrying 105 passengers and five crew members crashed near Kazakhstan's Aktau airport on Wednesday, with several of people believed to have died.

Hyderabad most booked city in 2024; Puri, Varanasi top spiritual destinationsIn 2024, Hyderabad has emerged as the most-booked city, leading the travel trend. Meanwhile, spiritual destinations like Puri, Varanasi, and Haridwar continued to attract pilgrims, with lesser-known spots like Govardhan and Deoghar gaining popularity.

OpenAI o3 puts humans on notice with its intelligence The new AI model called o3 by OpenAI already seems superhuman in its abilities. Once again, it puts into question what intelligence is and can AI be as intelligent as humans.

Mika Singh 'angry' over Anant Ambani not gifting him Rs 1.5 crore watch at weddingSinger Mika Singh performed at Anant Ambani's wedding and expressed disappointment over not receiving a Rs 1.5 crore watch gifted to select guests. However, he was satisfied with the generous fees.

Cops flag posts claiming stampede took place before Allu Arjun came, warn of actionHyderabad Police warned against spreading false information on the Sandhya Theater stampede, emphasising strict action against misleading posts. Actor Allu Arjun, out on bail, was questioned for four hours regarding the incident.

AAP vs BJP after Delhi departments warn public against 'misleading schemes'Two Delhi departments have released public notices saying the welfare schemes launched by AAP have not been notified by the government and are 'non-existent'. It has triggered a slugfest between AAP and BJP ahead of the Delhi elections.

Golan 'tourist' settlement named after Trump is major draw for 2,000 IsraelisCurrently, around 50 to 100 residents live in Trump Heights in Israeli-occupied Golan and another 2,000 are lining up to live in the enclave that was once a former Syrian territory.

Baby John review: Varun Dhawan-Keerthy Suresh's actioner is massy but messyReleased-Wed Dec 25, 2024Baby John movie review: Varun Dhawan, Keerthy Suresh and Jackie Shroff-starrer Baby John is a commercial entertainer with an overdose of mass moments. The performances of lead cast make the film enjoyable.

Where does Santa live? Myths, origins, and the global debateSanta's home remains a mystery, with countries like Finland and Turkiye laying claim to his legend. The origins of Santa Claus blend folklore, history, holiday cheer, and some good marketing.

Woman turns hair into a dazzling Christmas tree. No doubt, video goes viralA video of a woman converting her hair into a Christmas tree went viral on social media. The video has garnered over four million views so far.
It needs to be pointy: What's behind PSLV's round designHere's why the PSLV's Stage 4 (PS4) was seen covered with a protective round hood, instead of the traditional payload fairing.

Karnataka woman, 50, missing for 25 years, found in old age home in HimachalA 50-year-old woman from Karnataka, who went missing 25 years ago, was found at an old age home in Himachal Pradesh's Mandi.

Shakti Kapoor did BB to prove to his children he can stay away from alcoholActor Shakti Kapoor participated in Bigg Boss 5 to demonstrate to his children that he could remain alcohol-free for a month. His family expressed pride and love for his conduct on the show.

Australian stars celebrate Christmas with their families at MCGAustralia's cricket stars embraced the festive spirit at the MCG, celebrating Christmas with their families ahead of the Boxing Day Test. Australia make Travis Head call, announce playing XI for Boxing Day Test Australia vs India, 4th Test: Australia received a massive Travis Head boost on Christmas as they confirmed their playing XI for the Boxing Day Test. 19-year-old Sam Konstas will make his debut on Thursday.

Vinod Kambli develops fever in hospital, condition stableVinod Kambli, battling a severe urinary infection and brain clots, is stable in ICU. Maharashtra Deputy CM Eknath Shinde and MP Shrikant Shinde have extended financial aid and support, ensuring the former cricketer receives top-notch medical care.

Harshit or Prasidh Krishna? Pujara says India need another pacer for MCG TestCheteshwar Pujara stressed the importance of adding an extra pacer for India's Boxing Day Test against Australia, even at the cost of a batter, as concerns grow over India's bowling depth despite Jasprit Bumrah's stellar performances in the series.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
